Title: The Front Page
Writer: Ben Hecht (play), Charles MacArthur (play), Billy Wilder (screenplay), I.A.L. Diamond (screenplay)
Actors: Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Susan Sarandon, Vincent Gardenia
Plot: As a tabloid newspaper editor tries to prevent his top reporter from retiring, an escaped death row convict shows up at the office trying to convey his innocence.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
